name: raycast-typeid-generator-extension
title: TypeID Generator
description: Uses TypeID to generate a UUIDv7 with custom prefix.
author: lukas-runge

commands.name: generate-typeid
commands.title: Generate TypeID
commands.description: Generates a new custom prefixed UUIDv7.

preferences.name: disableCopyToClipboard
preferences.title: Copy to Clipboard
preferences.label: Disable copying to the clipboard
preferences.description: Copies the newly generated TypeID to the clipboard.

preferences.name: insert
preferences.title: Auto-Paste
preferences.label: Insert at cursor position
preferences.description: Automatically inserts the newly generated TypeID at the cursor position.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
